name: [Arsonist's Oil](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Arsonist%27s_Oil)
effect: Transforms target's resistance to weakness for  Duration: 2 turns.

name: [Basic Poison](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Basic_Poison)
effect: Inflicts  [Poisoned](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Poisoned_(Condition))([Constitution Save](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Saving_Throw) to negate) for  Duration: 3 turns.

name: [Crawler Mucus](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Crawler_Mucus)
effect: Inflicts  [Paralysed](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Paralysed_(Condition)) and  [Poisoned](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Poisoned_(Condition))([Constitution Save](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Saving_Throw) to negate both) for  Duration: Until [Long rest](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Long_rest).

name: [Diluted Oil of Sharpness](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Diluted_Oil_of_Sharpness)
effect: Grants a +1 bonus to [Attack rolls](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Attack_roll) and [Damage](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Damage_Roll) and the ability to overcome [Resistance](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Resistance) to non-magical damage for  Duration: 10 turns.

name: [Drow Poison](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Drow_Poison)
effect: Inflicts  [Sleeping](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Sleeping_(Condition)) and  [Poisoned](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Poisoned_(Condition))([Constitution Save](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Saving_Throw) to negate both) for  Duration: Until [Long rest](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Long_rest).

name: [Karabasan's Poison](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Karabasan%27s_Poison)
effect: Inflicts  [Paralysed](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Paralysed_(Condition)) and  [Poisoned](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Poisoned_(Condition))([Constitution Save](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Saving_Throw) to negate both) for  Duration: Until [Long rest](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Long_rest).

name: [Malice](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Malice)
effect: Inflicts  [Stricken with Malice](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Stricken_with_Malice_(Condition))([Constitution Save](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Saving_Throw) to negate) for  Duration: Until [Long rest](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Long_rest).

name: [Oil of Accuracy](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Oil_of_Accuracy)
effect: Grants a +2 bonus to [Attack rolls](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Attack_roll) for  Duration: 10 turns.

name: [Oil of Bane](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Oil_of_Bane)
effect: Inflicts  [Bane](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Bane_(Condition))([Charisma Save](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Saving_Throw) to negate) for  Duration: 2 turns.

name: [Oil of Diminution](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Oil_of_Diminution)
effect: Inflicts  [Reduced](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Reduced_(Condition))([Constitution Save](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Saving_Throw) to negate) for  Duration: 2 turns.

name: [Purple Worm Toxin](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Purple_Worm_Toxin)
effect: Inflicts  [Purple Worm Toxin](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Purple_Worm_Toxin_(Condition))([Constitution Save](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Saving_Throw) to negate) for  Duration: 1 turn.

name: [Serpent Fang Toxin](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Serpent_Fang_Toxin)
effect: Inflicts  [Serpent Fang Toxin](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Serpent_Fang_Toxin_(Condition))([Constitution Save](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Saving_Throw) to negate) for  Duration: 1 turn.

name: [Simple Toxin](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Simple_Toxin)
effect: Inflicts  [Simple Toxin](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Simple_Toxin_(Condition))([Constitution Save](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Saving_Throw) to negate) for  Duration: 1 turn.

name: [Thisobald's Brewed-Up Bellyglummer](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Thisobald%27s_Brewed-Up_Bellyglummer)
effect: Inflicts  [Brewed-Up Bellyglummer](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Brewed-Up_Bellyglummer_(Condition))([Constitution Save](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Saving_Throw) to negate) for  Duration: Until [Long rest](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Long_rest).

name: [Wyvern Toxin](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Wyvern_Toxin)
effect: Inflicts  [Wyvern Toxin](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Wyvern_Toxin_(Condition))([Constitution Save](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Saving_Throw) to negate) for  Duration: 1 turn.
